issue.title: [Format] Add canonical flag in COO sparse index
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4221](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4221). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To support the integration with scipy.sparse.coo_matrix, it is necessary to add a flag in SparseCOOIndex.  This flag denotes whether elements in COO sparse tensor is sorted lexicographically or not.
